text: As the couple deny fresh cheating and divorce rumours we take a look back at David's alleged affair with Rebecca Loos. The world's most famous soccer player marries a superstar pop singer, what could possibly go wrong? Almost ever since David and Victoria Beckham's 1999 nuptials, their relationship has been plagued by tales of alleged affairs, most famously the purported affair between David and his former - assistant, Rebecca Loos. And it seems a new - wave of cheating accusations could hit the Beckhams, as Twitter this weekend was set alight with rumours of infidelity and an impending Beckham divorce.
